column4: could someone please take a minutre and direct me to a website or ubuntu support page that details how to download the full official versions of ubuntuy 5.10 in both the gnome and kde verssions?

ps...  -- If Im already running breezy - the preview release - should i just  use the ubuntu update manager to get my system up to the stable build or should i just say screw it and do fresh installs?  Because currently i have things on this system that are very broken
